snippet.title: POSTWORLD - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
POSTWORLD - Official Gameplay Trailer (Hardcore Singleplayer Action RPG)
Release on Steam: September 1
https://store.steampowered.com/app/812980/POSTWORLD/

POSTWORLD - Геймплейный трейлер (Хардкорная Синглплеерная Экшн РПГ). 
Релиз в Steam: 1 сентября. 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/812980/POSTWORLD/

Website: http://postworldgame.com/
Indie DB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/postworld
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PostworldGame
Facebook: https://facebook.com/thepostworldgame
Join us https://vk.com/postworld_project
